channel.title: FLF - The Ezra Institute Podcast for Cultural Reformation
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Motherhood & the Family of God ft. Susie Rock [The Ezra Institute Podcast for Cultural Reformation]
item.description:
In this episode, Michael and Nate are joined by Harvest Windsor's Women's Life Director, Susie Rock, to continue the discussion on the family by discussing what it means to be a woman made in the Image of God, their role in the Kingdom of God and the family, and how they are to fulfill it for the good of others and the glory of God Almighty.

Episode Resources: Harvest Windsor | A Vertical Church: https://harvestwindsor.ca/;

For Ezra's many print resources and to join our newsletter, visit: https://ezrapress.com

Stay up-to-date with all things Ezra Institute:
https://ezrainstitute.com
Subscribe to Ezra's YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPVvQDHHrOOjziyqUaN9VoA?sub_confirmation=1;

Spotify Podcast: https://open.spotify.com/show/0dW1gDarpzdrDMLPjKYZW2?si=bee3e91ed9a54885.

Wherever you find our content, please like, subscribe, rate, or review it; it truly does help.

item.title: Fatherhood & the Family of God [The Ezra Institute Podcast for Cultural Reformation]
item.description:
In this episode, Joe, Michael, and Nate continue their discussion on the family by discussing what the archetypal fatherhood of God means for our ectypal familial relationships. Simply put, they discuss what God's fatherhood means for us and our relationships. Oh, how sweet it is to be part of the household of God through Christ our Lord.

For all things Ezra Institute, visit: https://ezrainstitute.com.
For Ezra's many print resources and to join our newsletter, visit: https://ezrapress.com.
item.author: Dr. Joseph Boot, Dr. Michael Thiessen, Nate Wright, SDG Media
item.itunes:author: Dr. Joseph Boot, Dr. Michael Thiessen, Nate Wright, SDG Media
